dialogs.npcText: *The white monkey stands out in the landscape, she seems distressed and upon seeing you waves you over.*
*The white monkey is pacing back and forth impatiently, and upon seeing you seem to perk up.*
*The white monkey is pacing back and forth impatiently, and upon seeing you seem to perk up.*
*The white monkey has pulled out an old scroll and is engrossed in reading it. SHe pays you no heed.*
*As you approach, the monkey smiles, and then points at her mouth. She appears to strain for a bit before closing his mouth.*
*The monkey rolls her eyes, unamused by your comment. She makes what you assume are very insulting gestures at you. You are happy she is out of poop.*
*She nods and draws an object on the ground. It appears to be a gem encased underground. After a few moments she erases the drawing.*
*The white monkey lunges at you and seizes the gem. She unlocks the barrier nearby and grabs a bag, placing the gem inside before sitting back down.*
